name: Art importer
description: This will import pixel art from an image file into the level editor

Use-OlderObjects.name: Use 2.1 pixels
Use-OlderObjects.description:
Will use the old 2.1 pixel object instead of the newer one.
This will <cr>not</c> work with the basic optimisation.

Enable-Basic-optimise.name: Optimise art
Enable-Basic-optimise.description: Optimises the art using 4 different objects of different sizes.

Enable-Scale.name: Use scaling
Enable-Scale.description:
Uses scaling to optimise the pixel art.
This is still in development and will <cr>not</c> work for most images.
Only works if <cr>optimise art</c> is checked.

Disable-limit.name: Remove size limit
Disable-limit.description:
Will remove the default size limit for images that can be imported.
Can cause <cr>crashes</c> if the image is too big so is not recommended.
